Description:
Calling All First Home Buyers & Investors!
CRANBOURNE CENTRAL - Nestled in a quiet spot in Cranbourne sits 13 Thomas Crescent. This property would make the perfect investment to add to your portfolio or first home.
From the entry of the home, you are greeted with a cheerful, sunny and generous sized living area with timber floors that are ready to be finished beautifully. The living space is complete with a split system and gas wall furnace.
Continuing on, the kitchen overlooks an equally as bright meals area and has the space for a dream kitchen to be made. Featuring a twin sink, separate pantry and plenty of bench space, there is room for multiple chefs in the kitchen!
You will find 3 good sized bedrooms all with built in robes, laundry room with rear access, spacious bathroom with a separate shower and bath and separate toilet.
Stepping outside you will be greeted with a paved entertainment area perfect for year-round entertainment. The large block of 657m2 means that there is plenty of grass and trees for the kids to play and enjoy, creating a peaceful environment for the family. The property also reaps the benefits of backing onto the James Cook Drive Reserve, providing additional green space, along with privacy unheard of in the heart of Cranbourne.
The property also features a double car port with a long driveway perfect for caravans or trailers, and a lovingly maintained front garden.
Features include:
- Gas wall furnace
- Split system
- Tiled kitchen and meals area
- Paved entertainment area
- Garden shed
The central area of Cranbourne is one of the most established and sought after areas. With a mix of older homes on larger blocks and units. Located within walking distance to all facilities, including the newly renovated Cranbourne Park, a range of restaurants, Cranbourne Secondary College and Cranbourne Train Station. Cranbourne Central provides the perfect combination for any resident.

Description:
A fantastic opportunity has arisen in the heart of Cranbourne...
On a generous 629sqm (approx) piece of land this home is waiting for its next owners.
Walking into the home you are welcomed by natural light and a homely feel right from the beginning.
The kitchen looks over the two living areas which makes entertaining seamless, boasting stainless steel appliances including wall oven, dishwasher and cooktop. There is plenty of cupboard space including a double door pantry and space for a double door fridge.
The master bedroom is generous in size and is located at the back of the home. With a walk in robe to store away all of those clothes there will be no issues. It also includes a full en-suite to avoid lines to the bathroom on those busy mornings.
The property has two other bedrooms which both have built in robes and are serviced by the separate toilet and bathroom which includes a bath tub for the kids or relaxation for the adults of the home.
Stepping outside you have a beautiful backyard with spaces for different uses. Just outside your living area is a great space for entertaining guests with a barbecue on a summer afternoon, then stepping out further is a great space for the kids to play or for the gardener of the family to shine. With a side gate access there is also ample room to store a boat, caravan or trailer for the hobbyists.
Other features of the home to mention are the alarm system for that peace of mind. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling to keep you content all year round, two garden sheds and a double garage to keep your cars out of the elements.
In terms of location you have everything at your doorstep, looking outside there are parklands across the road. 250m walking distance to the local primary school (Cranbourne Carlisle PS) 6 minute drive to the closest high school (Lyndhurst Secondary College) 700m from Springhill Shopping Centre and 750m from Carlisle Park - Don't hesitate and book an inspection today!
